summary: A biography of Poet Norman Corwin, and the events surrounding his powerful radio broadcast commemorating VE Day on May 8, 1945.
cast: Robert Altman|Norman Corwin|Walter Cronkite|Norman Lear|Studs Terkel
keywords: victory in europe day|radio|world war two|radio broadcasting|bill of rights
title: A Note of Triumph: The Golden Age of Norman Corwin
